lesson: Talking about New Discoveries and Innovations

words.definition: Something found for the first time.
words.arabic_definition: شيء يتم العثور عليه لأول مرة.

example.en: The scientist made an important discovery.
This innovation will change how we work.
The team announced a breakthrough in medicine.
example.ar: أعلن الفريق عن طفرة في الطب.

words.definition: The study of a subject to gain knowledge.

example.en: Research is vital for scientific advancement.

words.definition: A legal right to an invention.

example.en: He registered a patent for his invention.

words.definition: The process of creating or improving.

example.en: The company is focusing on the development of new technology.
example.ar: تركز الشركة على تطوير تكنولوجيا جديدة.

words.definition: An early version of a product.

example.en: The team tested the first prototype of the device.
example.ar: اختبر الفريق أول نموذج أولي للجهاز.

example.en: Artificial intelligence is reshaping many industries.
example.ar: يعيد الذكاء الاصطناعي تشكيل العديد من الصناعات.

words.definition: A radical change in an industry due to new technology.
words.arabic_definition: تغيير جذري في صناعة ما بسبب تقنية جديدة.

example.en: This invention caused a disruption in the market.
example.ar: تسبب هذا الاختراع باضطراب في السوق.

words.definition: The study of the natural world through experiments and observations.
words.arabic_definition: دراسة الطبيعة من خلال التجارب والملاحظات.

example.en: Science helps us understand the universe.
